title: Sonos Forecast Tops Estimates Despite Ongoing Supply Issues
itunes:title: Sonos Forecast Tops Estimates Despite Ongoing Supply Issues
description:
Patrick Spence, CEO at Sonos, discusses the audio-products company's revenue forecast that was greater than Wall Street expectations, but warned that supply-chain issues would continue to be a problem into next year.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
